sentences.en: A couple of good old country boys are having a wild and woolly time.
sentences.cn: 几个乡下来的青年狂欢作乐一番.

sentences.en: A sheep has a thick woolly coat.
sentences.cn: 绵羊有一层卷曲柔软的厚毛.

sentences.en: His ideas are a bit woolly.
I like the feel of this cloth; it has a warm woolly feel.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢这块布的手感, 它摸上去毛茸茸的很暖和.

sentences.en: Neanderthal man was able to kill woolly mammoths and bears.
sentences.cn: 尼安德特人能够捕杀浑身覆毛的猛犸象和熊。

sentences.en: Once Woolly Mammoths stood 180 feet high.
sentences.cn: 从前,长毛猛犸象曾高达180英尺.

sentences.en: One thing is certain: the competition for that golden goblet will be wild and woolly.
sentences.cn: 有一点可以肯定那 就是 为争夺金质奖杯的角逐一定是粗野的.

sentences.en: Put an extra woolly on when you go out.
Sam scratched his woolly head . " Ah did -- an'Ah din't.
She is wearing a woolly coat.
The woolly aphid has a lanate coat resembling cotton.
sentences.cn: 棉蚜虫有一层羊毛状的表皮,很像一团棉花.

sentences.en: The woolly shrank because it was washed badly.
sentences.cn: 这件套头毛衣因洗涤不当而缩水了.

sentences.en: The woolly spider monkey is the largest primate in the Americas.
sentences.cn: 绒毛蛛猴是美洲最大的灵长类动物。

sentences.en: This cloth has a warm woolly feel.
sentences.cn: 这块布摸上去毛茸茸的.

sentences.en: Wood was now comfortably enfolded in a woolly dressing-gown.
sentences.cn: 伍德正舒服地穿着件羊毛晨衣。

words.tran_cn: 羊毛；毛线；绒线；毛织品；毛料衣物
羊毛工（把羊毛分类的人）
羊毛的；模糊的；似羊毛的

trans.tran_cn: 羊毛的，像羊毛的，朦胧的
trans.tran_en: made of or feeling like wool
